thread.title: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Looks Like a Princess on the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Looks Like a Princess on the Red Carpet

title: Grammys 2017: Jennifer Lopez Looks Like a Princess on the Red Carpet
text: February 12, 2017 Getty Images When it come to the most iconic look at the Grammys, Jennifer Lopez's plunging Versace gown at the 2000 awards is the first one that comes to our mind. The barely-there gown has made headlines ever since its inception; and every year, we wait patiently to see if the singer will top the look with another statement-making creation. At the 2017 Grammy Awards, Lopez has caught our eyes once again, but in a pretty, lilac gown worthy of a Disney princess. The multi-talented entertainer wore a "lavender orchid confection" straight from Ralph & Russo's spring 2017 couture runway. With its soft draping, flower embellishment, and pastel hue, the look was a departure from the sequined covered numbers we usually see on the red carpet. Worn with sleek straight hair, pretty pink lips, and a pair of sparkly Christian Louboutin heels, the lovely ensemble was certainly a head-turner that will remain in the best-dressed list of all times.
